fftidy 0.0.0.90020
  • Reference

modified plot.variogram from ctmm

Source: R/ctmm_functions.R
plot_variogram.Rd

The function was altered from ctmm:::plot.variogram()

plot_variogram(
  x,
  CTMM = NULL,
  level = 0.95,
  units = TRUE,
  fraction = 0.5,
  col = "black",
  col.CTMM = "red",
  xlim = NULL,
  ylim = NULL,
  ext = NULL,
  ...
)

Details

It now returns the internally computed SVF (by using plot_svf - the altered version of ctmm:::plot.svf())

Examples

#> Source Code:
plot_variogram
#> function (x, CTMM = NULL, level = 0.95, units = TRUE, fraction = 0.5, 
#>     col = "black", col.CTMM = "red", xlim = NULL, ylim = NULL, 
#>     ext = NULL, ...) 
#> {
#>     alpha <- 1 - level
#>     if (!is.null(ext)) {
#>         xlim <- ext$x
#>         ylim <- ext$y
#>     }
#>     x <- ctmm:::listify(x)
#>     n <- length(x)
#>     CTMM <- ctmm:::listify(CTMM)
#>     m <- length(CTMM)
#>     ACF <- !is.null(attr(x[[1]], "info")$ACF)
#>     x <- lapply(x, function(y) {
#>         y[y$DOF >= 1, ]
#>     })
#>     if (!is.null(xlim)) {
#>         fraction <- 1
#>         x <- lapply(x, function(y) {
#>             y[xlim[1] <= y$lag & y$lag <= xlim[2], ]
#>         })
#>     }
#>     else {
#>         max.lag <- sapply(x, function(v) {
#>             last(v$lag)
#>         })
#>         max.lag <- max(max.lag, xlim)
#>         max.lag <- fraction * max.lag
#>         if (fraction < 1) {
#>             x <- lapply(x, function(y) {
#>                 y[y$lag <= max.lag, ]
#>             })
#>         }
#>         xlim <- c(0, max.lag)
#>     }
#>     if (ACF) {
#>         x <- lapply(x, function(y) {
#>             y$SVF <- clamp(y$SVF, -1, 1)
#>             y
#>         })
#>     }
#>     if (is.null(ylim)) {
#>         ylim <- extent(x, level = max(level))$y
#>     }
#>     if (!ACF) {
#>         SVF.scale <- ctmm:::unit(ylim, "area", SI = !units)
#>         SVF.name <- SVF.scale$name
#>         SVF.scale <- SVF.scale$scale
#>         SVF.name <- c(SVF.name, ctmm:::unit(ylim, "area", concise = TRUE, 
#>             SI = !units)$name)
#>         SVF.name[3] <- SVF.name[2]
#>         ylab <- "Semi-variance"
#>         ylab <- c(ylab, ylab, "SVF")
#>         ylab <- paste(ylab, " (", SVF.name, ")", sep = "")
#>     }
#>     else {
#>         SVF.scale <- 1
#>         ylab <- "Autocorrelation"
#>         ylab <- c(ylab, ylab, "ACF")
#>     }
#>     lag.scale <- ctmm:::unit(xlim, "time", 2, SI = !units)
#>     lag.name <- lag.scale$name
#>     lag.scale <- lag.scale$scale
#>     lag.name <- c(lag.name, ctmm:::unit(xlim, "time", thresh = 2, 
#>         concise = TRUE, SI = !units)$name)
#>     lag.name[3] <- lag.name[2]
#>     xlab <- "Time-lag"
#>     xlab <- c(xlab, xlab, "Lag")
#>     xlab <- paste(xlab, " (", lag.name, ")", sep = "")
#>     lab <- rbind(xlab, ylab)
#>     max.cex.w <- lab
#>     max.cex.w[] <- graphics::par("pin")/graphics::strwidth(lab, 
#>         "inches")
#>     max.cex.h <- lab
#>     max.cex.h[] <- (graphics::par("mai")[1:2]/graphics::par("mar")[1:2])/graphics::strheight(lab, 
#>         "inches")
#>     max.cex.w <- pmin(max.cex.w[1, ], max.cex.w[2, ])
#>     max.cex.h <- pmin(max.cex.h[1, ], max.cex.h[2, ])
#>     max.cex <- pmin(max.cex.w, max.cex.h)
#>     lab <- 1
#>     if (max.cex[lab] < 1) {
#>         lab <- lab + 1
#>     }
#>     if (max.cex[lab] < 1) {
#>         lab <- lab + 1
#>     }
#>     xlim <- xlim/lag.scale
#>     ylim <- ylim/SVF.scale
#>     col <- array(col, n)
#>     col.CTMM <- array(col.CTMM, m)
#>     x <- lapply(x, function(X) {
#>         ctmm:::unit.variogram(X, time = lag.scale, area = SVF.scale)
#>     })
#>     CTMM <- lapply(CTMM, function(M) {
#>         ctmm:::unit.ctmm(M, length = sqrt(SVF.scale), time = lag.scale)
#>     })
#>     for (i in 1:n) {
#>         SVF <- x[[i]]$SVF
#>         if (!ACF) {
#>             if ("MSE" %in% names(x[[i]])) {
#>                 MSE <- x[[i]]$MSE
#>             }
#>             else {
#>                 MSE <- x[[i]]$MSDOP
#>             }
#>         }
#>         lag <- x[[i]]$lag
#>         DOF <- x[[i]]$DOF
#>         if (length(lag) < 100) {
#>             type <- "p"
#>         }
#>         else {
#>             type <- "l"
#>         }
#>         for (j in 1:length(alpha)) {
#>             if (!ACF) {
#>                 LOW <- ctmm:::CI.lower(DOF, alpha[j])
#>                 HIGH <- ctmm:::CI.upper(DOF, alpha[j])
#>                 SVF.lower <- SVF * LOW
#>                 SVF.upper <- SVF * HIGH
#>             }
#>             else {
#>                 STUFF <- data.frame(lag = lag, SVF = SVF, DOF = DOF)
#>                 STUFF <- STUFF[DOF > 3, ]
#>                 lag <- STUFF$lag
#>                 SVF <- STUFF$SVF
#>                 DOF <- STUFF$DOF
#>                 FISH <- atanh(SVF)
#>                 SD <- 1/sqrt(max(DOF - 3, 0))
#>                 SVF.lower <- tanh(stats::qnorm(alpha[j]/2, mean = FISH, 
#>                   sd = SD, lower.tail = TRUE))
#>                 SVF.upper <- tanh(stats::qnorm(alpha[j]/2, mean = FISH, 
#>                   sd = SD, lower.tail = FALSE))
#>             }
#>         }
#>         if (i <= m) {
#>             ret_svf <- plot_svf(lag, CTMM[[i]], error = MSE, 
#>                 alpha = alpha, type = type, col = "blue")
#>         }
#>     }
#>     if (n < m) {
#>         for (i in n:m) {
#>             ctmm:::plot.svf(lag, CTMM[[i]], error = MSE, alpha = alpha, 
#>                 type = type, col = col.CTMM[[i]])
#>         }
#>     }
#>     return(ret_svf)
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x5591a25f5e08>
#> <environment: namespace:fftidy>
